amendment.description: Amendment restores the legal immigration categories that are defined under current law, strikes the cuts in permanent employer-sponsored immigration, and keeps refugees' admission at the current annual limit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 19 in House Rept. 104-483 and offered in a modified form pursuant to the unanimous consent agreement of March 19, 1995, to delete the provisions of the bill that places new limits on the categories and number of legal immigrants allowed into the U.S. each year.

action.text: Chrysler amendment (A017) modified pursuant to the unanimous consent agreement of March 19, 1996.
On agreeing to the Chrysler amendment (A017) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 183 (Roll no. 84).
